leadership.name: Lorenzo Barberis Canonico
leadership.bio: Former speech & debate coach turned tech entrepreneur. Lorenzo manages the development team, providing guidance to student developers.

leadership.bio: Experienced designer who ensures all Valyria projects meet the highest standards of UX/UI design.

students.bio: Dedicated to building user-friendly interfaces. Currently working on Generosity Bay Area and Roo projects.

students.name: Rohit

students.bio: Multi-talented developer and designer working on the Farmer Website for Earth Blessings.
